name: Reddit Shiny! Base Package
description:
Reddit Shiny! Base Package is ideal for the careful redditor, who seeks small incremental change. Besides the rounded borders, a dash of shadows completes this elegant style.

A screenshot can be viewed here: http://i.imgur.com/bsetr.png

Other Packages:
style 36724: A complementary selection of features.
style 36722: With all the bells and whistles.
style 36717: Choose your very own!
